name: py-maturin

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
Build and publish crates with pyo3, rust-cpython and cffi bindings as
well as rust binaries as python packages.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-tomli
dependencies.description:
Tomli is a Python library for parsing TOML. Tomli is fully compatible
with TOML v1.0.0.

dependencies.name: rust
dependencies.description:
The Rust programming language toolchain This package can bootstrap any
version of the Rust compiler since Rust 1.23. It does this by
downloading the platform-appropriate binary distribution of the desired
version of the rust compiler, and then building that compiler from
source.

dependent_to.name: py-watchfiles
dependent_to.description:
Simple, modern and high performance file watching and code reload in
python.

dependent_to.name: py-orjson
dependent_to.description:
Fast, correct Python JSON library supporting dataclasses, datetimes, and
numpy.

dependent_to.name: py-rtoml
dependent_to.description: A better TOML library for python implemented in rust.
